akn:section.akn:heading: Payments for eligible federally connected children

akn:subsection.akn:heading: Basic support payments; insufficient appropriations; State with only one local educational agency

akn:content.akn:p: (b) Basic support payments; insufficient appropriations; State with only one local educational agency

(f) Other funds Notwithstanding any other provision of law, a local educational agency receiving funds under this section may also receive funds under section 386 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 1993 or such section’s successor authority.
